#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>

int main () {
	int n, div, res, len, i;
	std::string str;
	std::cin >> str;
	len = str.length();
	while (len != 0) {
		n = 0;
		i = 0;
		while (i < len) {
			n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + (str[i++] - '0');
		}
		res = 0; div = 5;
		while (n / div != 0) {
			res += n / div;
			div *= 5;
		}
		printf("%d\n", res);
		str.clear();
		std::cin >> str;
		len = str.length();
	}
	return 0;
}
